Delegates
LoopStartedOperation
public delegate void LoopStartedOperation(
object sender
)

The loop that checks for updates every now and again has started

Parameter
sender
object

the object that initiated the call

LoopFinishedOperation
public delegate void LoopFinishedOperation(
object sender,
bool updateRequired
)

The loop that checks for updates has finished checking for updates

Parameters
sender
object

the object that initiated the call

updateRequired
bool

true if an update is required; false otherwise

UpdateDetected
public delegate void UpdateDetected(
object sender,
UpdateDetectedEventArgs e
)

An update was detected for the user's currently running software

Parameters
sender
object

the object that initiated the call

e
UpdateDetectedEventArgs

Information about the update that was detected

UpdateCheckStarted
public delegate void UpdateCheckStarted(
object sender
)

SparkleUpdater has started checking for updates

Parameter
sender
object

The SparkleUpdater instance that is checking for an update.

UpdateCheckFinished
public delegate void UpdateCheckFinished(
object sender,
UpdateStatus status
)

SparkleUpdater has finished checking for updates

Parameters
sender
object

SparkleUpdater that finished checking for an update.

status
UpdateStatus

Update status (e.g. whether an update is available)

public delegate Task CancelEventHandlerAsync(
object sender,
CancelEventArgs e
)

An asynchronous cancel event handler.

Parameters
sender
object

The source of the event.

e
CancelEventArgs

A System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs that contains the event data.

CloseApplication
public delegate void CloseApplication()

Delegate for custom application shutdown logic

CloseApplicationAsync
public delegate Task CloseApplicationAsync()

Async version of CloseApplication().  Delegate for custom application shutdown logic

AppCastItem item,

)

A delegate for download events (start, canceled).

DownloadProgressEvent
public delegate void DownloadProgressEvent(
object sender,
ItemDownloadProgressEventArgs args
)

Delegate that provides information about some download progress that has been made

Parameters
sender
object

The object that initiated the event

args
ItemDownloadProgressEventArgs

The information on how much data has been downloaded and how much needs to be downloaded

ItemDownloadProgressEvent
public delegate void ItemDownloadProgressEvent(
object sender,
AppCastItem item,
ItemDownloadProgressEventArgs args
)

Delegate that provides information about some download progress that has been made when downloading a specific AppCastItem.

Parameters
sender
object

The object that initiated the event

item
AppCastItem

The item that is being downloaded

args
ItemDownloadProgressEventArgs

The information on how much data has been downloaded and how much needs to be downloaded

UserRespondedToUpdate
public delegate void UserRespondedToUpdate(
object sender,
UpdateResponseEventArgs e
)

A handler called when the user responsed to an available update

Parameters
sender
object

The object that initiated the event

e
UpdateResponseEventArgs

An UpdateResponse object that contains the information on how the user responded to the available update (e.g. skip, remind me later).

public delegate void DownloadErrorEvent(
AppCastItem item,
string path,
Exception exception
)

A delegate for a download error that occurred for some reason

Parameters
item
AppCastItem

The item that is being downloaded

path
string

The path to the place where the file was being downloaded

exception
Exception

The  that occurred to cause the error
